evidence.claim: Cinnamon Health utilizes AWS for their cloud infrastructure to support their health tech applications.
The company implements FHIR standards for interoperability in healthcare data exchange.
Cinnamon Inc. adheres to HIPAA compliance for all data processing activities involving sensitive patient information.
They use Snowflake for their data warehousing solutions.
Integration with EHRs is facilitated through HL7 protocols in their backend APIs.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of X12 transactions or EDI-related use cases found.
